concept.title: Using the main screen
concept.shortdesc: The main screen gives you access to all of HCL Connections Chat functionality.

conbody.p: The following options are available from the left action bar on tablets.

row.entry: Search your contact list, or your corporate directory for chat partners.
Displays the text chat screen, which maintains a list of all active chats you are currently engaged in and your chat history.
Opens the Contacts screen, which list your contacts and groups.
Shows your current status on Connections Chat. You can change your status by pressing this button.
Displays the configuration menu for Connections Chat on your device. On tablets, the Settings option is located in the top right menu bar.
